validation_rules: nt_fvi01_wetland_validation(landpos, structur, moisture, typeclas, mintypeclas, sp1, sp2, sp1_per, crownclos, height, wetland, 1)
description: Check if there is a wetland code for the row. All wetland codes have the first character so check it exists
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

validation_rules: nt_fvi01_wetland_validation(landpos, structur, moisture, typeclas, mintypeclas, sp1, sp2, sp1_per, crownclos, height, wetland, 1)
translation_rules: nt_fvi01_wetland_translation(landpos, structur, moisture, typeclas, mintypeclas, sp1, sp2, sp1_per, crownclos, height, wetland, 1)
description: Validate character exists from the 4 character wetland code. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the first character.
